removeCard(Card) - Method in class model.classes.Hand
Removes the given card from the correct list.
retrieveDestinationCard() - Method in class model.classes.Player
Gets a Destination card from the deck and places it in the player's hand.
retrieveTrainCard() - Method in class model.classes.Player
Gets a train card from the deck and places it in the player's hand.
RoundPhase1(Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase one of a game round.
RoundPhase2(Player, Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase 2 has multiple options described in other methods.
RP2_1_pickTrainCards(Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase 2 Option 1, Pick some train cards
Pre Conditions : Player p is a valid object
Post Conditions : Full round is executed
RP2_2_pickDestinationCards(Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase 2 Option 2, Pick some Destination Cards
Pre Conditions : Player p is a valid object
Post Conditions : Full round is executed
RP2_3_throwTrainCards(Player, Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase 2 Option 3, throw some train cards (Train Robbery included)
Pre Conditions : Player p is a valid object
Post Conditions : Full round is executed
RP2_4_buyDestinationCards(Player) - Method in class controller.classes.GameLoop
Phase 2 Option 4, buy some destination cards
Pre Conditions : Player p is a valid object
Post Conditions : Full round is executed
